channel.title: Other writing locations on Steph Locke
channel.description: Recent content in Other writing locations on Steph Locke

item.title: Locke Data
item.description: Locke Data is a data science consultancy focussed on primarily on R and Azure. Read technical posts on the use of R and other tools.

item.title: Medium
item.description: I’ve used Medium over the years primarily for posts about the Microsoft Data Community and startup life.

item.title: Nightingale HQ
item.description: Nightingale HQ (NHQ) is a startup focused on improving productivity in the manufacturing sector through the use no-code programming, data, and AI.
